import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useLanguage } from "../../context/LanguageContext"; import { translations } from "../../translations"; import "./HeroSection.css"; const HeroSection = () => { const { language } = useLanguage(); const t = translations[language] || translations.ru; const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { setIsVisible(true); }, []); return (
